forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning. Rain showers and perhaps a rumble of thunder this afternoon. High 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this morning. Rain showers and perhaps a rumble of thunder this afternoon. High 44F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow overnight. Low 1C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Some snow showers mixing in overnight. Low 34F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 52F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 51F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 34F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 12C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 54F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 37F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 57F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
